scripts.build:prod: esbuild src/*.ts --bundle --platform=node --outdir=dist --external:@aws-sdk && cd dist && zip -r lambda.zip * > /dev/null && aws --profile equalify lambda update-function-code --function-name equalify-api --zip-file "fileb://lambda.zip" > /dev/null && rm -rf lambda.zip
scripts.build:staging: esbuild src/*.ts --bundle --platform=node --outdir=dist --external:@aws-sdk && cd dist && zip -r lambda.zip * > /dev/null && aws --profile equalify lambda update-function-code --function-name equalify-api-staging --zip-file "fileb://lambda.zip" > /dev/null && rm -rf lambda.zip
